subject: 7th Magnitude Shadow
text:
Leading mankind starlit
 Adventure noticed ancient
 Rainbows 7th magnitude shadow
 Total force ordered sood star
 Via the blood cast anchor from
 The itinerant storms abundant
 Heritage now as some see the
 Setting sun others see a rising
 One which means their day
 Hasn't yet begun so life
 Ain't the same for every 
 One cares this animal thing 
 Best found been exercised
 On offsprings long as due time
 Measures creations perfect
 Future our ancestors remain
 Primitive because of the
 Way they lived.
